message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. How about $142.50?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about $135? That's the lowest I can go.
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $138?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $137.50, but that's as low as I can go.
